text: læa phwk khea klaw a ni khux psu satw p læa phuch phl thi hwngham wi sung mimi khır ca briphokh man di nxkcak phu thi rea prasngkh theanan dwy kar xang khxng phwk khea læa psusatw thi hlang khxng man thuk ham læa psusatw thi phwk khea ca mi klaw phranam khx ngxallxhˌ bn man thangni penkar xuplokn khwam thec hı kæ phraxngkh sung phraxngkh ca thrng txbthæn lngthosʹ phwk khea nı sing thi phwk khea xuplokn khwam thec khun
